dct_description_sm: As in general notes. Issued in his: La geographie universelle, Paris, 1661.

1670, with 'ou MEXIQUE' added to 'NOVVELLE ESPAGNE' (bottom right). Issued in: Le monde ov la géographie vniverselle, contenant les descriptions, les cartes & le blafon des principaux païs du monde ... , [Vol.1, Map]9, 1670. '9' in manuscript at page top right.
As State 2, with “11” following “MEXIQUE”, in bottom right corner of map.

[1679], entitled "NOVA MEXICO". [Page]73 (top right). Place names changed include: Fretum Anian, Mare del Sud Pacificum, Nova Espagne, and Tropicus Cancri. Issued in his: Geographiae universalis, Nuremberg, 1679.
[1690], entitled "NOVA MEXICO". [Page] 93 (top right).Issued in: Geographiae universalis / Johann Christoph Beer. -- Johann Hoffman : Nuremberg, 1690.

California with indented northern coast. Destroit D'Anien and Agubela de Cato to north. Map shows California eastward to area of Apaches and Nouuelle France on mainland. Mer de Sud Pacifiqve. Title within scroll cartouche (top center).
